#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
    long long n,p,t,r1,r2,res;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    label:
    while(t>0)
    {
        r1=0,r2=0,res=0;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&p);
        if(p==0)
        {
            printf("1\n");
            t--;
            goto label;
            //continue;
        }

        r1=n%10;//last digit of base
        r2=p%4;//cycle digit
        if(r2==0)
            r2=4;
        res=pow(r1,r2);
        printf("%lld\n",res%10);

        t--;
    }

    return 0;
}
